entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
